title: Karnataka Hijab Row Live News: Hijab is not an essential religious practice of Islam, govt in HC; hearing to continue on Monday - The Indian Express
content:
1. Karnataka Hijab Row Live News: Hijab is not an essential religious practice of Islam, govt in HC; hearing to continue on Monday  The Indian Express

description: Karnataka Hijab Row Live News, Bangalore Today Updates, Bengaluru, Karnataka News Live, 18 Feb: Karnataka Congress President DK Shivakumar on Friday said that state Minister KS Eshwarappa must resign over his remarks that the saffron flag might become the national flag in the future.
